lead_paragraph: The Calgary Flames wasted little time signing the newly acquired forward Alex Tanguay, agreeing to a three-year, $15.75 million deal yesterday. Tanguay, picked up in a deal with Colorado during the N.H.L. draft on June 24, could have taken the Flames to salary arbitration but instead agreed to a contract that will pay him $5 million next season, $5.375 million in 2007-8 and $5.375 million in 2008-9.
